content: संजीवनं {@--1@} Living together. {@--2@} Bringing to life, life-restoring, reanimation, resuscitation. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the 21 hells; see <ls>Ms. 4. 89.</ls> {@--4@} A group of four houses, quadrangle. --नी {@--1@} A kind of elixir (said to restore the dead to life). {@--2@} Making alive, restoring life. {@--3@} Food. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Mallinātha's commentaries on <ls>Ku.</ls>, <ls>R.</ls>, and <ls>Me.</ls>
